title: Check List Membership
description: In this lab, you will learn how to write a function to check if any element in one list is included in another list, using a for loop and the `in` operator.

meta.title: Check List Membership: Efficient List Inclusion Verification
meta.description: Discover a powerful function to check if any element in a list is included in another list.
meta.keywords: list membership, python playground, python, programming tutorial, list inclusion, efficient algorithm, python function

steps.title: Check if any value in a list is included in another list
